https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/agTMDKm9qvRdX0SGaOV2IkXS8EY.jpg A baby is kidnapped in a Brazilian airport. Years later, the mother lives in Lisbon and works in a strip-tease bar so she can survive. When she is fired, she joins a gang of bank robbers... A Shot in the Dark
